Package edu.maen.core.interfaces

Interface ICity

public interface ICity

Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão (ESTG)
Politécnico do Porto (PP)
Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática (LEI)
Licenciatura em Segurança Informática em Redes de Computadores (LSIRC)
Paradigmas de Programação (PP)
2020 / 2021

Contract representing a City behaviour when dealing with recycling Bins, containers and their measurements

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addMeasurement​(IMeasurement measurement, IContainer container)
    Adds a new measurement to the city considering the recycling bin and container
    boolean addRecyclingBin​(IRecyclingBin recyclingBin)
    Adds a new Recycling Bin to the City
    IMeasurement[] getMeasurements​(IRecyclingBin recyclingBin, WasteType wasteType)
    Return a copy of a existing measurements from a recycling bin and waste type
    String getName()
    Getter for city name
    IRecyclingBin[] getRecyclingBin()
    Return a copy of a existing recyclebin

  • Method Details

    • getName

      String getName()
      Getter for city name
      Returns:
      city name

    • addRecyclingBin

      boolean addRecyclingBin​(IRecyclingBin recyclingBin) throws RecyclingBinException
      Adds a new Recycling Bin to the City
      Parameters:
      recyclingBin - recycling bin to be installed in the City
      Returns:
      1. true if the recycling bin was inserted in the collection storing all recycling bins
      2. false if the recycling bin already exists
      Throws:
      RecyclingBinException - if:
      1. The recycling Bin is null
      2. The recycling Bin is invalid, i.e. if the recycling have duplicate container of a certain waste type

    • addMeasurement

      boolean addMeasurement​(IMeasurement measurement, IContainer container) throws ContainerException, MeasurementException
      Adds a new measurement to the city considering the recycling bin and container
      Parameters:
      measurement - Measurement considering the Recycling bin and container
      container - The Container for the measurement
      Returns:
      1. true if the measurement was inserted in the collection storing all measurements
      2. false if the measurement already exists for a given date (Each container has only one measurement for a given date)
      Throws:
      ContainerException - if the container doesn't exists
      MeasurementException - if the value is lesser than 0 and higher to the capacity

    • getRecyclingBin

      IRecyclingBin[] getRecyclingBin()
      Return a copy of a existing recyclebin
      Returns:
      a copy of a existing recyclebins

    • getMeasurements

      IMeasurement[] getMeasurements​(IRecyclingBin recyclingBin, WasteType wasteType)
      Return a copy of a existing measurements from a recycling bin and waste type
      Parameters:
      recyclingBin - Recycling Bin for getting measurements
      wasteType - waste Type for getting measurements
      Returns:
      a copy of a existing measurements
